descriptionMdByRank.1: Increase HP by **12%**. Restore **8** Concerto Energy when casting Resonance Liberation. This effect can be triggered 1 time(s) every 20s. When casting Resonance Skill that heals, increase nearby party member's ATK by **14%** for 30s. Effects of the same name cannot be stacked.
descriptionMdByRank.2: Increase HP by **15%**. Restore **10** Concerto Energy when casting Resonance Liberation. This effect can be triggered 1 time(s) every 20s. When casting Resonance Skill that heals, increase nearby party member's ATK by **17.5%** for 30s. Effects of the same name cannot be stacked.

When casting Resonance Skill that heals, increase nearby party member's ATK by **21%** for 30s. Effects of the same name cannot be stacked.

When casting Resonance Skill that heals, increase nearby party member's ATK by **24.5%** for 30s. Effects of the same name cannot be stacked.
descriptionMdByRank.5: Increase HP by **24%**. Restore **16** Concerto Energy when casting Resonance Liberation. This effect can be triggered 1 time(s) every 20s. When casting Resonance Skill that heals, increase nearby party member's ATK by **28%** for 30s. Effects of the same name cannot be stacked.
